From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

He looks at where Killfest pointed on the map.
"Yes, I see."
He opens a link.
"Goldeneye, will you meet me and Killfest at the entrance, please."
He walks to the entrance.

::Hot Rod::

He jumps, avoiding more missiles.
He returns fire, with 4 plasma charges.
